page.title: 20Employment in Ilford.
page.content:
The{jobs}in our time are quite good. There are jobs like accountancy, book keeping, nursing, secretarial work, etc. These get good pay. You need good qualifications for these jobs so not many get them. It is a good thing that there are places like colleges schools and{Youth Training Schemes. Jobs nowadays are hard to find so that is why I try to study hard and get good marks in my{exams.}The work I want to do when I leave school is {nursing.}First there is Student Nurse and in that you learn as you do your work. If you then pass your exams, you can go up to a higher grade and work your way up like that.
Tracy Watson 4th year. ** Loxford High School. **
